product_name: GoPro Fetch Camera Mount Dog Harness
long_description: With 2 camera mounting locations, the Fetch harness helps you capture action shots of beloved canines chewing bones, fetching Frisbees and sniffing the world from their adorable, 4-legged viewpoint.
short_description: With 2 camera mounting locations, the Fetch harness helps you capture action shots of beloved canines chewing bones, fetching Frisbees and sniffing the world from their adorable, 4-legged viewpoint.
